608DBF14.Line11.BAE4: Prava sent me. I'm looking for Vigo.

925E1A81.Line25.AB791: Whole escort of Knights went missing there last week, along with the girl's mother and another woman. Watch yourself out there.

F71CE80D.Line3.AB791: You and that nuisance of a child both. Girl's been nagging us about a demon woman all week.

F869A0FF.Line23.AB791: Vigo's gone, looking into her claims. He should be at the mining camp north of here.
